channel.title: NPC Barrier and underattack after death. Help requested
channel.description:
Alright, I'm sure this is a common problem with most server sources, but when you attack an npc lets say.. in a heavily objected area.. no matter where you run it follows you.. right? Well.. it'll even walk through buildings and things designated as unwalkable. Does anyone have the slightest idea how to set an object or areas in the map unwalkable to an NPC.. not a player, i'm aware of barriers for players, also.. should you attack an NPC and die and it isn't killed it will follow you to your respawn and attack you.. Does anyone have the slightest idea how to set a trigger on death to prevent that NPC from staying focused on you and just returning to it's original position?
If there is a tutorial on this please point the url to me, I've searched and didn't see anything turn up. Thanks.

item.title: NPC Barrier and underattack after death. Help requested
item.dc:creator: @sonjichan sonjichan
item.description:
@sonjichan wrote:

Well this is a server source from a year ago, I’ve just kept it up with the times myself rather than download a newer one, not saying I haven’t borrowed snippets here and there. It’s completely compatible with Silab’s client, If I could fix this problem, then I could move on to bigger things heh. So… anyone who has the slightest idea or hint, just point it out to me and I’ll check it out thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: NPC Barrier and underattack after death. Help requested

Not most, all i think…

Every server I downloaded as of April '07 had the same error.Npc’s are like noclippers
